sentences.en: "We've got the car that killed Myra Moss." — "What!"
sentences.cn: “我们已经找到撞死迈拉·莫斯的车了。”——“真的！”

sentences.en: 40 A rolling stone gathers no moss.
A rolling stone gathers no moss.
sentences.cn: [谚]转石不生苔;[喻]转业不聚财.

sentences.en: Early work of Moss and Tansley used the formation as a unit.
sentences.cn: Moss和Tensley早期的研究是以群系作为单位.

sentences.en: He was found asleep on a pillow of leaves and moss.
sentences.cn: 有人看见他枕着树叶和苔藓睡着了.

sentences.en: Moss had clamped an unexpectedly strong grip on his arm.
sentences.cn: 莫斯突然紧紧抓住他的手臂。

sentences.en: Moss makes an attractive lining to wire baskets.
sentences.cn: 用苔藓垫在铁丝篮里很漂亮。

sentences.en: Peat moss is a major constituent of most soil mixes.
sentences.cn: 泥苔藓是许多土壤混合物的主要成份.

sentences.en: Sterling Moss and A? J? Foyt race cars professionally.
sentences.cn: 斯特林?莫斯和A? J? 福伊特都是职业赛车手.

sentences.en: The moss was soft and furry to the touch.
sentences.cn: 苔藓柔软，摸起来像绒毛。

sentences.en: The steps were slimy with moss.
sentences.cn: 台阶因长满苔藓而发黏.

sentences.en: When he started to collect dry moss, he found he could not rise to his feet.
sentences.cn: 等到他预备去收集干苔的时候, 他才发现自己已经站不起来了.

words.tran_cn: 生苔的，被苔覆盖的；青苔状的

phrases.tran_cn: 凯特·摩斯（英国超级模特）

trans.tran_cn: [宇](=manned orbital space station)载人轨道航天站
苔藓，藓沼，莫斯（男子名），泥炭沼
trans.tran_en: a very small green plant that grows in a thick soft furry mass on wet soil, trees, or rocks
